Title: Partners committed to completing Golden Pass LNG project despite contractor exit: ExxonMobil
Description: ExxonMobil told Kpler that stakeholders will continue working on the Golden Pass 15.6 mtpa export project in Texas and are committed to completing it despite lead contractor Zachry Group's bankruptcy filing.
Author: JS

Title: Austria’s OMV warns Gazprom may halt pipeline gas flows
Description: Austrian energy company OMV said that pipeline gas supplies from Russia's Gazprom may be suspended in connection with a foreign court ruling.
Author: JS

Title: Cyprus’ president’s discussions on Vasilikos LNG aimed at implementing the project
Description: The Cyprus President is holding discussions at a diplomatic level about the planned Vasilikos LNG terminal with the sole intention of implementing the project where construction has stalled.
Author: JS

Title: ADNOC buys 10% stake in Coral South FLNG development
Description: UAE’s state-owned ADNOC purchased Portuguese Galp’s 10% interest in the Area 4 concession of the Rovuma basin offshore Mozambique, which includes the 3.4 mtpa Coral South floating LNG export project, as the firm continues its international expansion.
Author: JS
